Street performance preparation, lively atmosphere  
They need a song to attract attention.  
Mother: "What shall we sing today?"  
Kolya: "Something to dance to, please!"  
Lida: "I only know ‘My Village’!"

Excited brainstorming, children gathered around  
They want to impress the crowd.  
Mother: "Let’s sing in French, ‘Cinq sous’!"  
Polenka: "Will they see we're well-born?"  
Kolya: "I’ll dance! Just tell me what to do!"

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The characters are preparing for a street performance, discussing what song to sing to attract attention and money.
